name: Chilanik's Chain
flavorText: Chilanik forged this belt under specific instructions from Worusk himself. At the height of the Immortal King's powers, most foes fled rather than face him, and this fact vexed Worusk greatly. But Chilanik's Chain allowed Worusk to catch even the swiftest of enemies so he might show them the consequences of challenging the Immortal King or his realm.

secondary.textHtml: Using War Cry increases the movement speed for you and all allies affected by 35% for 10 seconds. [30 - 40]%
